alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 11:58PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG EARLY THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog will affect portions of the I-35 corridor and northwest Wisconsin early this morning. Patchy areas of visibility of 1/4 mile or less are forecast. Visibilities are expected to improve by sunrise. A few locations in Minnesota which may see dense fog early this morning include Pine City, Hinckley, Sandstone, and Askov. In Wisconsin this includes Solon Springs, Maple, Danbury, Siren, Grantsburg, Minong, Trego, Spooner, Iron River, Cable, Hayward, Winter, Mellen, Glidden, Clam Lake, Park Falls, Phillips, Saxon, Hurley, and Mercer. If traveling, reduce your speed and use low-beam headlights when encountering foggy areas. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Keep updated on the latest forecast for fog development trends.
